newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Labouchere reiterates Nutricia strong Buy.
newsitem.headline: Labouchere reiterates Nutricia strong Buy.

text.p: COMMENT: Strong Buy (reiterated) - Upgrade of estimates after first half results and analysts meeting. Milupa contributing with 14-15 percent EBIT profit margin instead of earlier forecast 12 percent as result of infant milk which generates about 50 percent of sales and has a higher-than-average profit margin. Strong organic growth (9-14 pct) at "primary core activities" of cereals, meals/drinks/juices and clinical nutrition.
Slower organic sales growth at infant milk due to failed product introduction in Poland -- under repair -- and fewer "big batch trades" to developing countries.
